lines.line: Aaaarrrrrghhh!
O-oh, he seems cheesed off...
What man-thing want?
Errr... I've got to go.
Arrrghhh, die man-thing!
Ahhh, it no use, I too sad!
Awww, you poor troll. What seems to be the problem?
I love Aga, she so beautiful, she smell so nice, like rotting dead ice wolf!
But Arrg that... arrrrrg! He together with Aga and he much stronger than Ug. He rip Ug apart!
Who is Aga?
She most beautiful troll in world.
Ug want to marry Aga, but she with Arrg!
Don't worry now, I'll see what I can do.
You help Ug? You nice, maybe Ug not eat you!
Errrr... thanks... I think?
I will go and talk to Aga.
A crying troll who's in love?! This just gets better and better!
Hahahahaha... a crying Troll.
I bet all the other trolls laugh at you!
Go away, man-thing, leave Ug alone!
Hahahahaa!
What you want, man-thing?
Well... you're big and hairy?
Thanks, me very careful about looks!
Errr...
So... how's your... um... love life?
It ok, I with Arrg, he very strong and mighty but sometimes...
I not know if he love Aga, He say he will show he love by bringing me flower Trollweiss.
It a very rare, beautiful flower, it very special!
It grow somewhere in these mountains.
And Arrg said he would get you the flower?
He very strong, if he love Aga he will get Trollweiss.
So... what do you think about Ug?
Who?
You know that wimpy, crying... nevermind.
Aga can't wait for Trollweiss. Arrg will show his love!
Whaaaaaaaat?
Ehh, Excuse me... Mr. Troll, sir,
How did you grow so big and strong?
Get away from Arrg, puny man-maggot. Or you lunch!
Your girlfriend said you know where to find Trollweiss?
Girlfriend? Which one?
Errr... Aga.
Yes, she good cook and wash but talk too many. Arrg strong troll, Arrg mighty troll, Arrg have many girlfriends!
Yes, yes, you're great, but what about the Trollweiss?
I no know, I just say to make Aga shut up!
So you don't actually know where to find the Trollweiss?
Great...
I've got to go.
You talk to Aga yet?
Yes, she said that she really wants a certain flower! Trollweiss, I think she called it.
Oh no! Then Ug no chance, Trollweiss not found in years!
Don't worry I'll find it for you!
You no chance, Ug no chance, need someone who live whole life in mountains. Ug no know anyone like that...
Hang on a sec...
Have you got flowers yet?
Sorry, I'm still looking.
Do you know where I can find Trollweiss?
It has been a long time since someone has asked me about Trollweiss.
In the old days Trollweiss could be found all over the mountains, but recently it has been disappearing!
There is one place, where I am sure it still grows, but it is impossible to get to.
Nothing's impossible, if you put your mind to it!
Ahhh, the youth of today. So sure of their prowess. But who am I to stop you from walking into your doom, if that is what you wish to do!
Spare me with the lectures and tell me where to find this flower!
Well, you will need to enter the domain of the ice trolls! This is an area full of wicked beasts and biting cold. From there you will find a way down a slope to a plateau where the Trollweiss grows.
It used to be easy to get to this plateau, but it is now snowed over and virtually inaccessible. That's global warming for you!
There must be a way to get there.
There is maybe one thing...
Go on.
If you could make some sort of sled, you could probably get down there but I don't know where that would lead you, as you will not be able to go up the mountain again.
That doesn't sound like a very good idea to me!
Pah, who are you to talk? Without me you would never have found the secret path to the plateau!!
What would I need to make such a sled?
Well, I'm no expert. Maybe you should speak to someone who knows more about such technical stuff.
Like who?
Why don't you ask Dunstan. He's always helped me with my spiked boots.
Thank you very much for the information.
See you later
Hi!
Hi! Did you want something?
Nothing, thanks.
I need a sled!!
Yes.
So why do you need a sled then?
I need the sled to get to a certain location in the mountains.
No.
Hahahaha.
No, I actually still like rolling around in the snow.
Well, I guess some of us never grow up!
Well, since you've helped my family out a couple of times, I'd be glad to build a sled for you.
Let me think...
Yeah, that should do it. I will need some yew or maple logs, a bar of iron and some rope.
I should have my designs ready by the time you have brought me all the materials
Have you got all the materials for the sled yet?
No, I haven't got everything yet.
Well, unfortunately I can't make the sled without all the materials.
Yes, I have all the materials for the sled.
Well, here's the sled but it will need to be waxed. The wax will need to both protect the sled as well as smoothen it.
Maybe if you mix some wax with a bit of swamp tar it will achieve the desired effect. You'll also need something to store the wax in... like a cake tin.
Where can I get wax from?
I don't know. I'm a smith! But maybe you should look for some bees.
Where can I get swamp tar from?
The swamp of course! It's south of Lumbridge.
What else do I need?
You will also need a cake tin to store the wax in.
See you!
Thank you, come again.
Hello again.
Have you got flower yet?
Yes, I've got it right here.
Thanks man-thing. Ug so happy!
But me too scared to give Trollweiss to Aga because Arrg will eat Ug for breakfast.
What? So I have to get rid of Arrg as well? After all this trouble I should be the one getting the girl...
Then again maybe not.
You no touch Aga. Ug kill you.
Ok, I'll tell Arrg you said that. Shall I tell him to meet you here?
No, no, no, wait! Ug just joke, oh great man-legend. Ug puny, you strong.
I suppose I am a bit of a legend. Ok I'll do it!
You defeat Arrg yet?
No, not yet. Something like this requires careful planning.
I am here to kill you!
Very good, Arrg was getting hungry.
But not in front of the lady, let's take it outside.
Aga deserves better than you.
What you mean? Arrg strong troll, Arrg mighty troll. Every troll woman want Arrg.
But you don't love her!
This concept of 'love' confuses and infuriates Arrg.
Looks like I'm going to have to teach you a lesson in 'love'.
Oh mighty man-warrior, please no hurt Arrg.
Yes, he has been defeated.
You very strong and nice. Take pretty rocks as thanks.
Thanks, Ug. So, now you can go and speak to Aga!
I too scared.
Has anyone ever told you that you are a useless troll? My grandmother has more guts than you and she doesn't even have her teeth anymore!
Whaaat? Man-thing want to die? Ug no scared of you or your grandmother! Ug show you. Ug go to Aga now.
How did it go with Aga?
I give Trollweiss to Aga and she say it taste very nice. She very happy and we together now.
What?! I went through all that trouble to get a snack for a hungry troll?
Thank you many for getting Ug together with Aga. We much happy together! I so happy I can't stop crying!
Thanks for getting Aga and Ug happy. Without you Ug too shy, Aga so in love with Ug!

characters.name: Aga
characters.description: Adult female troll, deep gravelly voice with a softer feminine quality, simple speech patterns with broken grammar, romantic and vain about her appearance.

characters.name: Arrg
characters.description: Large adult male troll, extremely deep booming voice, aggressive and intimidating tone, arrogant and dismissive, speaks in third person with simple vocabulary.

characters.name: Dunstan
characters.description: Middle-aged male human, British accent, friendly and helpful tone, practical craftsman who takes pride in his smithing work, straightforward and matter-of-fact.

characters.name: Tenzing
characters.description: Elderly male human, weathered voice with slight breathiness, gruff and direct manner, experienced mountain sherpa who speaks with seasoned wisdom and practicality.

characters.name: Ug
characters.description: Adult male troll, higher-pitched gravelly voice for a troll, whiny and emotional tone, timid and lovesick, speaks with broken grammar and frequent despair.
